title: Aleksandr Yeshkin
text:
Aleksandr Aleksandrovich Yeshkin (; born 8 September 1982) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is the manager of FC Khimik-Avgust Vurnary.
Club career.
He made his debut for <a href="FC%20Torpedo-ZIL%20Moscow">FC Torpedo-ZIL Moscow</a> on 14 September 2002 in a <a href="Russian%20Cup%20%28football%29">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Lada%20Tolyatti">FC Lada Tolyatti</a>. He played 4 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Metallurg-Kuzbass%20Novokuznetsk">FC Metallurg-Kuzbass Novokuznetsk</a>, <a href="FC%20Lada%20Tolyatti">FC Lada Tolyatti</a> and <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Barnaul">FC Dynamo Barnaul</a>.
